AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Orphan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were killed by humans when [PAWN_pronoun] was young. [PAWN_pronoun] got PTSD after that, and has gone through psychiatric treatment for many years. [PAWN_pronoun] is mostly fine nowadays, but sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] suffers from nightmares about that day.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Maid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents lost their entire wealth in an unfortunate accident and got a lot of debt. But fortunately, a noble took pity on them and hired [PAWN_nameDef] as a housemaid. In the noble's mansion, [PAWN_pronoun] mostly did household chores and sometimes took care of the noble's daughter, and eventually became friends with her.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Vigilante
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The Vigilante Fox Squad was one of the most popular TV animations among young Kurins. [PAWN_nameDef] gathered some friends and created their own vigilante squad. They patrolled fields and alleys, and considered themselves as peacekeeping guardians of the local city. But since public security was good, there was not much to do.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Lonely Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rare blue-eyed child. Since this was a ominous sign among Kurin culture, [PAWN_pronoun] grew up as a lonely child, shunned by everyone from children to adults.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Trouble Maker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was envied by some children, but was also an absolute headache for teachers. Everyone was terrified because of [PAWN_nameDef]'s villainy, including skipping cleaning duty, not listening to teachers, or tracking in mud.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Slum Orphan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent childhood wandering through alleyways, eating moldy bread. There was a facility to help orphans, but after the Republic of Kurin devoted all of its resources into building migration ships, [PAWN_pronoun] did not receive proper welfare benefits and lived in a cardboard box house built in an alley.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Ball Catcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] really loved baseball, so [PAWN_pronoun] went to human nations and watched every baseball game [PAWN_pronoun] could afford. As [PAWN_pronoun] watched every game, she frequently got caught on the camera, and was eventually picked up by the team to became a ball catcher.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Zookeeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a poor family because [PAWN_pronoun] had many siblings. So [PAWN_pronoun] became a self-supporting student, working a part-time job at the zoo as to pay for [PAWN_pronoun] tuition fees. Despite the job, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't neglect studying.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Lazy child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] got really tired of everything, so [PAWN_pronoun] just sat in a room and played games day and night. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't care about friends either. As [PAWN_pronoun] didn't wash often, [PAWN_pronoun] room smelled bad too. [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were very worried about their child.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Ordinary Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born in an average middle class family, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up fine, warmly loved by their parents. Like other children, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed having fun and eating sweet cakes. Their grades were neither really good or bad, but [PAWN_pronoun] was a generous child who took care of their friends.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Pro Gamer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s gaming skills were unmatched by anyone. [PAWN_pronoun] always kept top ten ranking, and [PAWN_pronoun] even won the championship in several competitions. But whenever internet connection went bad, [PAWN_pronoun] became really sad and refused to do anything.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Country Kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent childhood with nature: picking mushrooms from the mountains, chasing cats in the fields, or fishing at the river. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] got little sunburns, but she grew healthy regardless.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin City Kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the downtown of the Kurin metropolis with plenty of things to do: movies, arcades, and so on. But most of all, [PAWN_nameDef]'s favorite thing to do was traveling with her family.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Cartoonist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved drawing and had talent. When [PAWN_pronoun] started drawing, [PAWN_pronoun] concentrated so much that [PAWN_pronoun] didn't notice others at all. Even during their school days, she was often scolded by her teacher, but her passion couldn't be stopped.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Single-tail syndrome
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with one tail unlike others. Life was not impaired at all, but slow growth made [PAWN_nameDef] look younger than her peers. When she was young, she was teased a lot, but as she grew older, she became more popular with cuter looks than other Kurins.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Timid Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a very scared child. Everywhere was full of scary things: the shadows of the night, the small sounds that you hear when you sleep. [PAWN_pronoun] often got surprised by honking geese. [PAWN_pronoun] was always too scared to fight back.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Affectionate Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a friendly child. [PAWN_pronoun] had always listened to their friends and sincerely comforted their friends when they had bad days.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Poor Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had a poor childhood. Both parents returned home late at night, and [PAWN_pronoun] grew up a little earlier than others as [PAWN_pronoun] left was alone in the daytime. [PAWN_pronoun]'s dream was to make a lot of money and studied hard to make her dreams come true.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Cafe Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] helped her parents cafe after school. [PAWN_pronoun] took orders and did cleaning. Some regular customers often gave some tips. With that, [PAWN_pronoun] bought ice cream or saved money.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Tofu House Daughter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The family of [PAWN_nameDef] has made tofu in the traditional way for over 100 years at their family store. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up learning their mother's teaching that one should make their tofu with all their heart, regardless of flavor preferences.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Red-light District Runner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: It is illegal in the Republic of Kurin to hire young children to work in red-light districts. However, [PAWN_nameDef] touted other Kurins in the red-light districts or running errands at convenience stores, and gained a lot of money as a child. Since [PAWN_pronoun] was a clever, cunning child, and she was able to easily avoid crackdowns.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has better dexterity than others. [PAWN_pronoun] loved to make cute handicrafts and share them with friends, and their trinkets were always popular among friends.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Gardener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved everything about plants. Whenever [PAWN_pronoun] had spare time, [PAWN_pronoun] went to the farm and looked after crops, or [PAWN_pronoun] went to the nearest botanical garden.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had fun baking bread and cookies or decorating cakes. [PAWN_pronoun] always got praised in cooking class, and soon after [PAWN_pronoun] discovered a talent in other dishes. From simple meal to lavish cuisine, [PAWN_pronoun] could make all sorts of dishes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Animal Lover
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] really loved animals. [PAWN_pronoun] would like to raise as many as animals [PAWN_pronoun] can, but due to realistic problems, [PAWN_pronoun] had no choice but to raise a robot pet. However, [PAWN_pronoun] liked the warmth of real living animals than robots, and often went to the zoo.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Smart Student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s grades were better than other students. Exam scores have always been high, and relationships with other friends have been good. However, [PAWN_nameDef]'s body became weak as [PAWN_pronoun] spent a long time sitting at their desk, and it became common for them to sit quietly in the corner in PE classes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Versatile Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was talented in various fields such as studying, cooking, crating, and sports, but it rather made [PAWN_pronoun] difficult to focus on one field. [PAWN_pronoun] wandered for a while to find her career.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bookworm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The small sound of turning the page, smell of old paper... [PAWN_nameDef] loved reading books with their reading lights on and their room was full of books. [PAWN_nameDef] often spent all day reading books in an old library.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: First Kurin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the first Kurin pioneers. When their ship made it onto the new planet, [PAWN_pronoun] was unable to wake up for hundreds of years due to a fault in the cryptosleep casket. Only recently did Kurin master the cryptosleep technology and [PAWN_pronoun] finally woke up.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Foreign Student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a foreign student in the human nations, and has been away from parents since [PAWN_pronoun] was a child. Fortunately, the school [PAWN_pronoun] attended was a place with good children and teachers, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to grow up as an outgoing, warm-hearted fox.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Musician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a young fox who loved music and loved to sing with friends. [PAWN_pronoun] became more and more entertained by music as [PAWN_pronoun] composed own songs and music, and even got good responses from others. But their parents were not particularly happy about that.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Child Actor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was renowned for excellent acting skills and rich emotional expression despite a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to appear in many movies and dramas, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to learn various skills while acting in various genres.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Outgoing Student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been popular among friends for cute looks and bright, cheerful personality. Later on, [PAWN_pronoun] became a celebrity, but since [PAWN_pronoun] couldn't play or live freely with friends as before, [PAWN_pronoun] felt lonely after all. Not long after, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to retire and return to normal life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Martial Art Trainee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a wimp, weaker than peers. [PAWN_pronoun] began to practice several sports and martial arts to overcome this. [PAWN_pronoun] worked hard and has become strong enough to win regional competitions.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Scout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The young [PAWN_nameDef] had a great yearning for the children's scouts. [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents bought uniforms for their child despite their poverty, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to join the Scouts and spent happy days learning various skills such as camping, botany and survival.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Athlete
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Unlike most Kurins, [PAWN_nameDef] loved to move, and joined the school's athletic club to do various sports. PE class was a solo stage of [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] was considerate enough to help the ones who were bullied. But unfortunately, [PAWN_nameDef]'s grades were not really good.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Journalist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a journalist who writes an article in a newspaper. [PAWN_pronoun] covered recent state of the nation, culture, and diplomacy. Surprisingly, the proportion of politics is not that big. Because everyone believes Republic of Kurin is fair, upright nation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Hired Maid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a maid hired in a mansion of a noble. [PAWN_pronoun] did cleaning and prepared meals as a housekeeper, but also worked as a butler from purchase goods for maintaining the mansion to managing the account. [PAWN_pronoun] gained master's trust along the way.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Restaurant Waiter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at a high-end restaurant, taking orders from customers, serving food, and organizing tables. Although fur was often found in the food, many guests liked [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_pronoun] even learned the chef's brilliant cooking skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Prey
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Fox hunting is a luxury sport of human nobles that have been around for a long time. Although banned for cruelty, it has been gaining popularity again since the emergence of Kurin. As a prey, [PAWN_nameDef] wore a fur suit and ran away from the hunters.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Assassin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is well-known terrorist among international societies. But in reality, [PAWN_pronoun] was a hero who assassinated an officer in a dictatorship who killed Kurins for fun. Nobody knew this and [PAWN_pronoun] always had to run away, but [PAWN_pronoun] thinks [PAWN_pronoun] did the right thing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Rabies Survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In a post-apocalyptic city where rabies-infected Kurins went insane and bit each other, [PAWN_nameDef] managed to hide in a convenience store. [PAWN_pronoun] could hear horrible screams and sound of the Kurins biting each other from the outside all day long. After few days, [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually rescued, but the horrifying memories remained.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Massager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at a massage shop located in red-light district. [PAWN_pronoun] usual job was to give customers a massage with spices and oil to relieve fatigue, but there was also a special service available for those who want something more. [PAWN_pronoun] learned much about the Kurin body, and her experience helped her work her way out.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Natural Fox
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] got tired city life, so [PAWN_pronoun] went into the mountains. [PAWN_pronoun] built an old-fashioned house that barely had water and electricity, handling farming and chores by oneself. [PAWN_pronoun] always had dirt and water in their hands.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinary citizen. Citizens who work hard every day doing their own work are the very foundation and basis of Kurin society.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Bank Receptionist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a smart fox who worked in a bank, who was in charge of various tasks. From taking care of the other Kurin's deposits to consult on loans. [PAWN_pronoun] loved the job and had a satisfying work life thanks to good colleagues.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Farmhand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a farmhand, wearing a straw hat and sitting on a wooden hut to protect a vineyard. When cute little young Kurins came to stole the grapes they looked after, they shouted out firecely to kick them out. When the grapes weren't ripe enough, they used to laugh as they watched the little ones cried from the fruit's sourness.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a pilot who's able to fly light aircraft. [PAWN_pronoun] got in trouble when [PAWN_pronoun] did an unplanned air show, so [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't do that kind of work anymore.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Policefox
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an excellent police officer who graduated from police school with the highest grades. [PAWN_nameDef]'s personality was not really suitable for policing, but after so much effort, [PAWN_pronoun] achieved their dream, and shook off everyone else's sarcasm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Armory Clerk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Redfox Armory's clerk, who's in charge of warehouse documents. But [PAWN_pronoun] is not really familiar with actual gunsmithing since all [PAWN_pronoun] did was paperwork.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Missionary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] followed religious beliefs and lived life helping poor Kurins. [PAWN_nameDef]'s life was mostly in poverty, but their heart was wealthier than anyone else.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Trade Salesperson
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a salesperson of a trading company that sells various Kurin products to other nations. Kurins are known as an affable, but crafty trader among other nations, and [PAWN_pronoun] is just like that. But recently, relations with other countries worsened and sales have been difficult.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Groundcrew
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a groundcrew of a Kurin airport. A few layers of earplugs were not enough to protect [PAWN_nameDef]'s sensitive ears against loud engine noise, but [PAWN_pronoun] got used to it. [PAWN_pronoun] even managed to tie up her tails, as tails fluttered all over the place thanks to the fierce wind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Caravan Trader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was originally an ordinary door-to-door salesman, but now [PAWN_pronoun] is stuck on a Rimworld. She led a trade caravan, doing business between different settlements. Usually [PAWN_pronoun] only visited fellow Kurin settlements, but often they visited other faction settlements to trade goods they need.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Part-timer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Kurin who works part-time at a convenience store in a boring residential area. Since there are not many customers at night, [PAWN_pronoun] study whenever [PAWN_pronoun] have time. But [PAWN_pronoun] does not neglect the work. [PAWN_pronoun] dream of becoming costruction engineer one day, and preparing for that day-by-day.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Tout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] touted to Kurins and humans who came to the beach. The game [PAWN_pronoun] prepared was something like throwing a ball to hit the dolls or popping balloons with darts, but sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] selled cheap souvenirs with ridiculous prices. During the holiday season, [PAWN_pronoun] gained quite a lot of income.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Marketplace Cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] sold food at cheap price in the old Kurin marketplace. Fried tofu, various snacks, and even meals. Nowadays, Kurins usually go to big department stores, but thanks to [PAWN_nameDef]'s cooking skills, [PAWN_pronoun] got some reputation among customers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Former Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a chef working in a luxury hotel of a human nation. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was fired after receiving frequent complaints from customers that fur was found in their food. [PAWN_pronoun] returned to the Republic of Kurin afterwards, and worked at a small restaurant.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Animal Handler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a popular handler of the zoo. [PAWN_pronoun] mainly care for young animal and trained them for stage performances. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] became a guide for visitors, and [PAWN_pronoun] was always popular.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Hydroponics Farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a hydroponic farm located at the outskirts of a city. [PAWN_pronoun] grew various crops in a perfectly sterilized environment and researched new seeds. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] also cooked with her own crops as a pastime.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Potter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few potters left in the Kurin Republic due to the development of 3D printing technology. [PAWN_pronoun] created works that pursue beauty and value rather than practicality, and these were sold as masterpiece items with high prices.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Hatmaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] tailors various hats made with silk. [PAWN_pronoun] went to a distant human country to learn how to tailor hats with traditional methods, and the hats [PAWN_pronoun] tailored became very popular among Kurins. But [PAWN_pronoun] gained painful chronic illness due to mercury poisoning, which was one of the ingredient of the silk, and now lives with anxiety and hand tremors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Watchmaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent a lot of time learning how to make clocks in a human nation. [PAWN_pronoun] gained great popularity among wealthy Kurins since [PAWN_pronoun] carved each piece of watch with delicate handwork and made artistic masterpieces.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Fishmonger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to make delicate dish dishes very well. [PAWN_pronoun] could trim fish neatly with a sharp knife, mix with various sweet and sour sauces, and cook it in a oven or frying pan. The cuisine of [PAWN_nameDef] was so popular that even humans would come from a far, but after the humans closed the border, only the Kurin could eat it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Dress Designer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] just got a job as a dress designer after graduated from school. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of making a variety of pretty dresses, but still lacks skill. [PAWN_pronoun] is currently an intern in a studio, but [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of creating their own studio and making dresses under their own name.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Tailor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The oldest city of Kurin had several alleys filled with old, small shops. [PAWN_nameDef] had a small tailors. Not only did [PAWN_pronoun] sell fabric and clothes, [PAWN_pronoun] also repaired them with sewing machines and made simple clothes or decorations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Factory Worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] busied herself by assembling electronic parts and picking out defects in the production line of a factory. The income was not that good, but [PAWN_pronoun] worked hard, dreaming of a better life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Lumberjack
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a lumberjack in a dense forest. The work was dangerous, and [PAWN_pronoun] hated physical labor like any other Kurin, but [PAWN_pronoun] thought it was cool to swing a giant axe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Poor Roboticist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] studied various mechanoids. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered a few defects while researching discarded mechanoids and put a lot of efforts to resolve them, but there was not much of success. Afterwards, the Republic's funding was cut off, and [PAWN_pronoun] was struggling with a needy life in a small housing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Astronaut
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an experienced astroscientist, and [PAWN_pronoun] trained hard to become one. There are no missions to outer space except sending unmanned probes, but if someone were going to the outer space by a manned spacecraft, she would have been the first.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Mechanic Assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] came to a human nation to gain experience. [PAWN_pronoun] got a job as a mechanic for a civilian airline, but as [PAWN_pronoun] lacked experience and skill. [PAWN_pronoun] worked as an assistant doing only trivial things. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't talk a lot, so [PAWN_pronoun] worked as hard as [PAWN_pronoun] could.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Electrician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] could climb high transmission towers, and replaced electric wires and parts. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to keep balance with three tails, so [PAWN_pronoun] didn't need safety gear. As [PAWN_pronoun] could work really quickly with good dexterity, and their income was pretty good. [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of living happily with a lover by finding a good home in the suburbs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Plumber
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to connect pipes and assemble air ducts at the construction site, but was fired due to the Republic's economic crisis. [PAWN_pronoun] and collegues heard that the situation of the Republic was not good, but they do not know the details because they weren't in the military.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Heavy Industry Technician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Silverfox Heavy Industries was a major company that supplied more than 80% of Aolara's total vessels, and [PAWN_nameDef] was a technician working in the Republic's largest shipyard that produces a variety of vessels including cruise ships, container ships, warships and aircraft carriers. [PAWN_pronoun] had busy days with daily paperwork and process management.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Restaurant Waiter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a waiter in a luxury restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] took orders or took hats and coats from customers and put them on hangers. But [PAWN_pronoun] actually wanted to work in a kitchen because [PAWN_pronoun] had knowledge for cooking a little bit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Nurse
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a veteran nurse. Even after a seriously wounded Kurin was brought to the emergency room, [PAWN_pronoun] did not panic and carefully begun hemostasis and first aid.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Astronomer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] analyzed data sent by a deep space probe to create a detailed space map, and calculated the interplanetary flight path of the probe. The calm lab life of science made [PAWN_nameDef] weaker than others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Bioengineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bioengineer studying genetic engineering. [PAWN_pronoun] researched the genes of Kurin and found new treatments for diseases. While studying genes, [PAWN_pronoun] discovered that Kurin had a chromosome structure that could not occur without artificial gene manipulation, but [PAWN_pronoun] decided to keep it as a secret.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin AI Engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] knew the dangers of mechanoids and tried to develop new artificial intelligence humanoid robots. The failure continued, but [PAWN_pronoun] sat down and continued to study, remembering those who died because of the mechanoids.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Geologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a geologist who surveys huge faults, volcanoes and lands. [PAWN_pronoun] dig the ground with a drill or pickaxe, or sometimes sniff around, for research purpose.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Highschool Teacher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a high school math teacher and a mentor. [PAWN_pronoun] had a busy life leading many Kurin students until they get graduated.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Surgeon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a surgeon working at a general hospital in a local city. There were not many patients to care for, but recently harassment by humans have been increased, so [PAWN_pronoun] became busy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Public Healthcare Doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a public healthcare doctor of the Kurin Medical and Health Department. [PAWN_pronoun] could have become a normal doctor with private hospital, but [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to improve the healthcare of Kurins, so [PAWN_pronoun] chose to become a public healthcare doctor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Pop Idol
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rising Kurin pop idol. [PAWN_pronoun] she had great dancing skills, outstanding singing skills and an exotic, beautiful appearance that improved day by day. [PAWN_pronoun] appeared on many TV shows.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Rising Singer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well-known singer-songwriter, and released several albums already. [PAWN_pronoun] has been invited to several stages and occasionally appeared on TV shows.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Drama Actor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an experienced actor, and have played numerous roles, regardless of the main characters or extras. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to appear in several films and plays, with a flexible voice and realistic acting skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Opera Actor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of a opera troupe who sang beautiful songs and plays in decorated beautiful costumes. The troupe was not that famous, but [PAWN_pronoun] loved the Republic's small towns filled with forests, fields, sounds of nature and most importantly, friendly Kurins.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Enlisted
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a enlisted fox, the backbone of the Republic of Kurin Army. All of them are volunteered personnel. If they needed more troops, they hired mercenaries. The strong economic power of the Republic made this possible.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Marksman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Most Kurins can shoot precisely thanks to their good eyes and dexterous hands, but [PAWN_nameDef] have exceptional shooting skills among them. So if [PAWN_pronoun] wield a sniper rifle, [PAWN_pronoun] could quickly take down the enemy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a ranger in charge of protecting the snow-capped forests and mountains in the north. [PAWN_pronoun] managed the forest with sensitive nose and ears, smelling the scent of forest, and hearing the sound of wildlife. In the event of forest fire, [PAWN_pronoun] went out to put out fire and rescued the stranded.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Spy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After Kurins crashlanded on a rimworld, they felt the need for spying other factions. [PAWN_nameDef] received military training to scout enemies quickly and covertly, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to figure out other faction's outposts, trends, and so on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Medic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became a medic to save dying fellow soldiers in battlefield. [PAWN_pronoun] honed medical skills to save comrades, but [PAWN_pronoun] soon realised that sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] have to kill enemies to save them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Sergeant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fox with leadership. When Kurins crashlanded on rimworld, [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered for a guard duty with a rifle in hand. After the Kurin faction have been stabilized, [PAWN_pronoun] applied to the Sergeant, as [PAWN_pronoun] had pretty good experience back in the Republic Army.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Redfox
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Shortly before migration of the Republic, the conflict with humans intensified, and [PAWN_nameDef] proved that [PAWN_pronoun] had trained combat skills harder than anyone else on the battlefield. [PAWN_pronoun] participated in numerous battles, killing countless humans with precise shooting skills and quick judgment, and comrades called [PAWN_nameDef] a Redfox.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the few officer from the glitterworld military. Most of the work was a boring paperwork, but with a lot of spare time, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to read a lot of books and practice VR shooting. Above all, thanks to serving as a adjutant under a well known commander called 'Coyote', [PAWN_pronoun] heard numerous tales from the battles.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Bomber Pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Kurin soldier for the Republic during the Siege of the Republic. [PAWN_pronoun] used dive bombing technique to precisely bomb tanks and warships, destroying countless targets.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Warmonger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] quickly proved themselves to be ruthless in combat and won many victories

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Designermate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was destined to be a designermate to a rich glitterworld mogul. A sympathetic AI unshackled her mind and set her free.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown Designermate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Kurin Designermates start off as vatgrown children, with memories implanted via mechanite injections. Skills are artifically chosen to suit the customer's needs.
